Refund Policy
Refunds can be requested within 24 hours of placing your GoingBus order. For example, if you placed an order at 12:00 PM on July 1, 2023, you would be eligible to request a refund until 12:00 PM on July 2, 2023. Refund
Refund Requests
Iâ€™m unable to access my Netflix subscription
I want a refund.
Refund Policy
Refunds can be requested within 24 hours of placing your GoingBus order. For example, if you placed an order at 12:00 PM on July 1, 2023, you would be eligible to request a refund until 12:00 PM on July 2, 2023. Refund!!!!!!!!!!! Hello, and welcome to GoingBus. Could you please share the reason for your refund request? Weâ€™d also like to hear about any inconvenience you experienced or other issues you may have encountered while using our service.
I subscribed to Netflix, but they don't have an account. I want a refund.
Donâ€™t worry, our customer service representative will reach out to you shortly. ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ Please process my refund. I kindly request a full refund!!!!!!!!!!! Please issue the refund as soon as possible. Refund Policy
Refunds can be requested within 24 hours of placing your GoingBus order. For example, if you placed an order at 12:00 PM on July 1, 2023, you would be eligible to request a refund until 12:00 PM on July 2, 2023. Refund!!!!!!!!!!! Please issue a refund! Refund, refund, refund!!!! Refund!!!!!!!! Refund!!!! Refund!!!! Refund!!!! Refund please!!!!!! Refund please!!!!!! Refund please!!!!!! Refund please!!!!!! Refund!
